edge: Both Tom Cruise and Sofia Boutella are featured in the cast of the movie.

Annabelle Wallis plays the role of Jennifer 'Jenny' Halsey in the movie.
Ahmanet, portrayed by Sofia Boutella, is the title character of the movie.
In addition to Nick Morton, Tom Cruise's co-star Jake Johnson plays Chris Vail in the movie.
Chris Vail is portrayed by Jake Johnson in the movie.
In the movie, Courtney B. Vance takes on the character of Colonel Greenway.
